title: Can't play or patch
body:
I Have reinstalled and flush my dns. I still can't get it to let me play the game.(http://imgur.com/a/Swa6B)]
[(http://imgur.com/a/NCyLm)]

replies.body: It seems redownloading it 3-4 times worked.

Force repatch hasn't worked.
Doing a clean uninstall and reinstall
I will try and do the force repatch.

Sometimes that can happen when the latest patch goes a little wonky. I'm not sure what you've tried with the HRT so far, but I'd like to make sure you've run it with **Force Repatch** turned on. That should make the client patch again, and then you should be good to go. Let me know if that's not helping though!
